pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Multi ThreadingExample Class-------------```pythonimport multithreadingclass Demo(multithreading.MultiThread): def task(self, task): print(task)```Example Main------------```pythontask_list = range(1, 3 + 1)demo = Demo(task_list, threads=3)# Startdemo.start()```Result```123```**OR**```pythondemo = Demo(threads=3)# Start threadsdemo.start_threads()# Adding task to queuedemo.add_task(1)demo.add_task(2)demo.add_task(3)# Wait until queue is emptydemo.join()```Result```123```Install-------```shell$ pip install multithreading```
